19: וְגַלְתִּ֥י <sup>1523 </sup> <n>And I will rejoice</n> בִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>in Jerusalem</n> וְשַׂשְׂתִּ֣י <sup>7797 </sup> <n>and joy</n> בְעַמִּ֑י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>in my people</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>shall be no more heard</n> בָּהּ֙ ע֔וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> ק֥וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>and the voice</n> בְּכִ֖י <sup>1065 </sup> <n>of weeping</n> וְק֥וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>in her nor the voice</n> זְעָקָֽה׃ <sup>2201 </sup> <n>of crying</n>
20: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מִשָּׁ֜ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> ע֗וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> ע֤וּל <sup>5764 </sup> <n>There shall be no more thence an infant</n> יָמִים֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>of days</n> וְזָקֵ֔ן <sup>2205 </sup> <n>nor an old man</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> יְמַלֵּ֖א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>that hath not filled</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָמָ֑יו <sup>3117 </sup> <n>his days</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הַנַּ֗עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>for the child</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>old</n> מֵאָ֤ה <sup>3967 </sup> <n>an hundred</n> שָׁנָה֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> יָמ֔וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall die</n> וְהַ֣חוֹטֶ֔א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>but the sinner</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>old</n> מֵאָ֥ה <sup>3967 </sup> <n>[being] an hundred</n> שָׁנָ֖ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> יְקֻלָּֽל׃ <sup>7043 </sup> <n>shall be accursed</n>
21: וּבָנ֥וּ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>And they shall build</n> בָתִּ֖ים <sup>1004 </sup> <n>houses</n> וְיָשָׁ֑בוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and inhabit</n> וְנָטְע֣וּ <sup>5193 </sup> <n>[them] and they shall plant</n> כְרָמִ֔ים <sup>3754 </sup> <n>vineyards</n> וְאָכְל֖וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and eat</n> פִּרְיָֽם׃ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>the fruit</n>
22: לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>They will not</n> יִבְנוּ֙ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>They shall not build</n> וְאַחֵ֣ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>and another</n> יֵשֵׁ֔ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>inhabit</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>They will not</n> יִטְּע֖וּ <sup>5193 </sup> <n>they shall not plant</n> וְאַחֵ֣ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>and another</n> יֹאכֵ֑ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>eat</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כִימֵ֤י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>for as the days</n> הָעֵץ֙ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>of a tree</n> יְמֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[are] the days</n> עַמִּ֔י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> וּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>the work</n> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of their hands</n> יְבַלּ֥וּ <sup>1086 </sup> <n>shall long enjoy</n> בְחִירָֽי׃ <sup>972 </sup> <n>and mine elect</n>
23: לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>They will not</n> יִֽיגְעוּ֙ <sup>3021 </sup> <n>They shall not labour</n> לָרִ֔יק <sup>7385 </sup> <n>in vain</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Or</n> יֵלְד֖וּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>nor bring forth</n> לַבֶּהָלָ֑ה <sup>928 </sup> <n>for trouble</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> זֶ֜רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>for they [are] the seed</n> בְּרוּכֵ֤י <sup>1288 </sup> <n>of the blessed</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> הֵ֔מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וְצֶאֱצָאֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>6631 </sup> <n>and their offspring</n> אִתָּֽם׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n>
